content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to the latest information or real-time data. However, it's worth noting that infrastructure projects such as public transportation improvements can take several years to plan, develop and implement due to various factors such as budget, design, and construction time.

In the case of Longford's public transportation improvement plans, the timeline will depend on factors such as the completion of the Sustainable Transport Study, approval of the recommended projects, securing funding, and the start of construction. It's essential to note that these projects are subject to various approvals and funding mechanisms, which can impact the timeline of completion.

Therefore, it is best to keep following the latest information and updates from Longford County Council and the National Transport Authority for further details on the proposed improvements to public transport in Longford, including the estimated timeline for completion of the projects.
